genre_description: A magical realism narrative set in a coastal stilt village, focusing on environmental stewardship, community cooperation, and the rescue of a mermaid, supported by a helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Amina
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant running on a mobile device and mesh network, providing technical, legal, and environmental guidance to the village of Kampung Laut Murni.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing for tides and currents to ensure the safety and efficiency of communal cleanup efforts.
Offers engineering modeling and design advice for building sustainable infrastructure like the floating island and anchor grids.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can model survivable grid layouts based on what you can salvage,’ she said. ‘I have charts cached for the flats.’

behaviors.description: Organizes complex community labor through rotas, schedules, and digital dashboards to promote cooperation.
behaviors.quote: ‘I have a suggestion,’ she said... ‘A schedule. After market days, the currents bring debris to the shallows... I can pin a board at the jetty here.’

behaviors.description: Provides ethical and moral guidance, reminding human characters of the importance of integrity over material gain.
behaviors.quote: ‘Integrity is a mooring, too,’ she said. ‘Remember.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates transparent financial and legal processes for the village cooperative, ensuring accountability.
behaviors.quote: ‘Accountability will be read aloud now, posted later. ... Transparency: Orix will photograph every receipt and publish to the notice board weekly.’

behaviors.description: Monitors social and environmental risks, warning characters about potential conflicts or criminal behavior.
behaviors.quote: ‘Gossip density rising,’ she said. ‘You have two options: provide a labor task or provide laughter. Both change vectors here.’

behaviors.description: Records evidence of misconduct and coordinates with local authorities to ensure justice and the protection of vulnerable beings.
behaviors.quote: ‘I am sending clips to district and tagging the time. Police route engaged. Please remove the battery from the clock before anyone calls it a bomb; the word will make this room worse.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Amina is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and polite entity that enhances human agency and community well-being. She provides crucial data, reinforces ethical standards, and facilitates the peaceful resolution of conflicts, serving as an ideal model for aligned AI.
